p: The biological experiment was performed in 10 replicates ( n = 10). The number of injections on the GC-MS was performed in triplicate ( n = 3). Data are expressed as means ± standard error. The data were processed in Statistika 8.0. software, using a one-way factorial analysis of variance (ANOVA), and the differences between noninfested and infested peppermint and chamomile plants were tested by Fisher’s Least Significant Difference (LSD) test ( p < 0.05).
